headline.main: 35,000 MARK DAY AT ETERNAL LIGHT; Mayor in Chief Address Vows U.S. Will Stand By Until Dictators Are Crushed

lead_paragraph: An Armistice Day throng of 35,000 persons at the Eternal Light monument in Madison Square yesterday heard Mayor La Guardia declare that America would "stand by until nazism, Hitler and the dictators are crushed and destroyed and the world is free again."
abstract: Armistice Day observance, N Y C

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: GOLD STAR MOTHERS OF WORLD WAR, AMER, INC

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: VETERANS OF FOREIGN WARS OF THE U S
